title: This deal won't last long! Gorgeous 1 bed, 1 bath! Prime location.
posting_body: ['Come home to a great community - Brooks Crossing Apartments!', 'Address:', '8050 Taylor Road', 'Riverdale, GA 30274', 'Beds:', '1  /', 'Baths:', '1 /', 'Size:', '725 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1243', 'We are also just a few miles from major interstates and a short commute to Downtown Atlanta.', 'We invite you to call us for more information or come by Brooks Crossing Apartments and see why our residents love to call us home!', 'We look forward to showing you around our community.', 'Security Deposit:', 'Call', 'Length of Lease:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Property Features:', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Fitness Center', '➢ Gated', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Picnic Areas', '➢ Playground', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '➢ Covered Parking', '➢ Fax/Copy Services', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Sports Courts', '➢ Tennis Court', 'Apartment Amenities:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Deck', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Fireplace', '➢ Freezer', '➢ Heating', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Vaulted Ceilings', '➢ Walk-In Closets', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wi-Fi', '➢ Window Coverings', 'Pets:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Business Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Ready to Lease?', 'Call our office at', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DA311A3086094D']
